name: grandiflora
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe a variety of a plant grown in gardens that has very big flowers: Here and there were towering magnolia grandiflora. Choose the older grandiflora varieties as they are exquisitely fragrant as well as beautiful.
More examplesFewer examplesThe two main categories of petunia to grow from seed are grandiflora and multiflora.The sweet peas had the lush, rich perfume generally found only in the older grandiflora types.In the summer, there was a wonderful display of grandiflora petunias.
